colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a classic black and white base with a teal accent for a modern touch.
colorTheory.mood: Professional, modern, with a hint of vibrancy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures excellent readability.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The black and white text and background colors create a strong foundation, while the teal accent color adds a refreshing contrast.
